page.title: 04Home Life
page.content: {Home Life} by Alison Carlile My dad was a teacher and was sent out to Africa.There he met my{mother} and they were married ,bought a{house} and my mother gave birth to my sister-Catherine.When they came to Britain they bought a bungalow at Butterslade Grove where I was soon born. I moved to Glyncollen School as soon as it opened as it was nearer than Ynystawe,two months later we moved onto the new Wimpey estate because we needed a bigger house.We had a{piano}which used to be in my room but now it's in the dining area. There is much more room ,but I prefer a bungalow myself.
